name: Don't taste the lava - Ludum Dare 46
name_original: Don't taste the lava - Ludum Dare 46
description:
Our goal was to get better at making games, especially 3D ones. We are sure that we learned much along the way. At first, we had two prototypes and couldn’t decide what game to choose and finish. We wanted to finish under 48 hours, but because our deciding skills took 12 hours away, we had to use whole 72 hours - and even that was close one.

We hope you will have fun playing “Don’t taste the lava” and thanks in advance for every feedback.

DOWNLOAD FOR WINDOWS:

You can download on Google Drive or here on itch.io
